languages.text: "Вы кажетесь компетентным офицером, Версериан. Тем страннее, что вашим подчиненным не хватает дисциплины: вчера на мостик было допущено три посетителя сверх нормы".
"You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."
languages.original_text: "Вы кажетесь компетентным офицером, Версериан. Тем страннее, что вашим подчиненным не хватает дисциплины: вчера на мостик было допущено три посетителя сверх нормы".

traits.locale_text: "You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."
"You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."
"You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."
"You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."
"You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."

languages.text: 「お前は有能な士官のようだな、ウェルザリアン。それだけに、お前の部下たちに規律が欠けているのは奇妙なことだ。昨日は、ブリッジへの許可人数の上限を3人も超える訪問者が通されていたぞ」
languages.original_text: "You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は有能な士官のようだな、ウェルザリアン。それだけに、お前の部下たちに規律が欠けているのは奇妙なことだ。昨日は、ブリッジへの許可人数の上限を3人も超える訪問者が通されていたぞ」

languages.text: "Ihr scheint mir ein kompetenter Offizier zu sein, Werserian. Umso sonderbarer, dass es Euren Untergebenen an Disziplin mangelt. Gestern wurde die Höchstgrenze der erlaubten Besucher auf der Brücke um drei Personen überschritten."
languages.original_text: "You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr scheint mir ein kompetenter Offizier zu sein, Werserian. Umso sonderbarer, dass es Euren Untergebenen an Disziplin mangelt. Gestern wurde die Höchstgrenze der erlaubten Besucher auf der Brücke um drei Personen überschritten."

languages.text: « Vous m'avez l'air d'un officier compétent, Werserian. Il est donc d'autant plus étrange que vos subalternes manquent de discipline : hier, ils ont autorisé trois visiteurs de plus que la limite à venir sur la passerelle. »
languages.original_text: "You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez l'air d'un officier compétent, Werserian. Il est donc d'autant plus étrange que vos subalternes manquent de discipline : hier, ils ont autorisé trois visiteurs de plus que la limite à venir sur la passerelle. »

languages.text: «Parece un oficial competente, Werserian. Por eso no entiendo la flagrante carencia de disciplina de sus subordinados: ayer había tres visitantes más de los permitidos en el puente».
languages.original_text: "You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: «Parece un oficial competente, Werserian. Por eso no entiendo la flagrante carencia de disciplina de sus subordinados: ayer había tres visitantes más de los permitidos en el puente».

languages.text: “你看起来是位精明强干的军官，韦尔森总领，但奇怪的是，你的属下缺乏纪律。昨天，舰桥上的军官人数超出了上限，比规定的数量多了三个人。”
languages.original_text: "You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: “你看起来是位精明强干的军官，韦尔森总领，但奇怪的是，你的属下缺乏纪律。昨天，舰桥上的军官人数超出了上限，比规定的数量多了三个人。”

languages.text: "İşinin ehli bir subaya benziyorsun Werserian. Buna karşın astlarının disiplinsizliklerine şaşıyorum. Köprüye alınacak ziyaretçi sayısı, dün üç kişiyle aşıldı."
languages.original_text: "You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "İşinin ehli bir subaya benziyorsun Werserian. Buna karşın astlarının disiplinsizliklerine şaşıyorum. Köprüye alınacak ziyaretçi sayısı, dün üç kişiyle aşıldı."

languages.original_text: "You seem a competent officer, Werserian. It is all the more strange that your subordinates lack discipline: yesterday three visitors more than the maximum limit were permitted on the bridge."
